function.name: search_knowledge_base
function.description: Search the iPostal1 knowledge base to find answers to customer questions. Use this tool whenever a customer asks about iPostal1 services, pricing, mail forwarding, package handling, 1583 forms, account management, or any other iPostal1-related topic. Always search the knowledge base before answering questions to ensure accuracy.

query.description: The customer's question or the topic to search for. Be specific and include key terms from the customer's question.

messages.content: Let me check our knowledge base for that information.
I'm having trouble accessing our knowledge base right now. Let me try to help you with what I know, or I can transfer you to a support agent.
